plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 02-2451

                        KELLY SAINT FORT,

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                JOHN ASHCROFT, Attorney General,

                      Respondent, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court, issued on May 9, 2003, is amended
as follows:

     On page 24, line 16, delete the word "non".
